医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
UVA 研究揭示神经系统在艰难梭菌感染中的作用弗吉尼亚大学医学院的新研究表明，我们神经系统中负责“战斗或逃跑”反应的部分可能会影响潜在致命的艰难梭菌感染的严重程度。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241010/UVA-research-reveals-nervous-systems-role-in-C-difficile-infections.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241010/UVA-research-reveals-nervous-systems-role-in-C-difficile-infections.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f712c939-1e6f-471c-a398-0ba7f7181171 Thu, 10 Oct 2024 09:56:11 -0400 UVA research reveals nervous system's role in C. difficile infections
格兰特支持罕见代谢疾病的基因编辑研究一项 1400 万美元的赠款将资助宾夕法尼亚大学 (Penn) 佩雷尔曼医学院和费城儿童医院 (CHOP) 的罕见代谢疾病基因编辑疗法研究。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241010/Grant-supports-gene-editing-research-for-rare-metabolic-diseases.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241010/Grant-supports-gene-editing-research-for-rare-metabolic-diseases.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=93763876-45af-41cf-a6e2-ebe11f30173d Thu, 10 Oct 2024 09:46:48 -0400 Grant supports gene-editing research for rare metabolic diseases
人类预期寿命的增长可能会放缓研究表明，如果老龄化方面没有重大进展，根本不可能延长寿命，因此需要对退休计划和人寿保险进行改革。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241010/Rise-in- human-life-expectancy-may-be-slowing-down.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241010/Rise-in- human-life-expectancy-may-be-slowing-down.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0c35b14b-7090-46a3-90b6-705e4734649f Thu, 10 Oct 2024 09:29:00 -0400 Rise in human life expectancy may be slowing down

能够产生电荷的新型手术缝线可以加速伤口愈合研究人员开发了 BioES 缝合线，这是一种生物可吸收缝合线，可通过电刺激加速伤口愈合，显示出卓越的愈合效果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241010/New-surgical-stitches-capable-of-geneating-electrical-charge-may-accelerate-wound-healing.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241010/New-surgical-stitches-capable-of-geneating-electrical-charge-may-accelerate-wound-healing.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=adebce8​​8-2902-4432-a606-4e59ebea12c8 Thu, 10 Oct 2024 08:31:00 -0400 New surgical stitches capable of generating electrical charge may accelerate wound healing
新的计算机模拟提供了对大脑功能的见解萨里大学的科学家们建立了一种新的计算机模拟我们的大脑如何发育和生长神经元。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241010/New-computer-simulation-offers-insights-into-brain-function.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241010/New-computer-simulation-offers-insights-into-brain-function.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0d13bd2d-e022-43d5-8b42-8a64fd9508ad Thu, 10 Oct 2024 08:16:38 -0400 New computer simulation offers insights into brain function
早期前列腺癌手术可提高生存率与那些直到肿瘤开始出现症状才接受治疗的前列腺癌患者相比，在发现肿瘤后立即切除整个前列腺的前列腺癌患者的生存率提高了 17 个百分点。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241010/Early-prostate-cancer-surgery-linked-to-improved-survival-rates.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241010/Early-prostate-cancer-surgery-linked-to-improved-survival-rates.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c0101246-ea25-4b85-870d-e0117551b3cd Thu, 10 Oct 2024 08:09:00 -0400 Early prostate cancer surgery linked to improved survival rates

三种常见心血管疾病与认知障碍和痴呆风险相关美国心脏协会发表的一份新的科学声明称，成人中三种常见的心血管疾病——心力衰竭、心房颤动和冠心病——与认知障碍和痴呆风险增加有关。今天发表在协会的期刊《中风》上。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241010/Three-common-cardioangio-diseases-linked-to-cognitive-impairment-and-dementia-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241010/Three-common-cardioangio-diseases-linked-to-cognitive-impairment-and-dementia-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=02533f2b-8fa1-481d-91db-7e4f9617048c Thu, 10 Oct 2024 07:27:57 -0400 Three common cardiovascular diseases linked to cognitive impairment and dementia risk
